[addi r1,r0,10, addi r2,r0,10, add r3,r0,r1, addi r4,r0,1, mainLoop:sw r4,0(r3), addi r3,r3,1, addi r4,r4,1, blt r4,r2,mainLoop, add r3,r0,r1, add r4,r0,r2, add r5,r0,r0, jal adder, j exit, adder:lw r6,0(r3), add r5,r5,r6, addi r3,r3,1, addi r4,r4,-1, blt r0,r4,adder, jr r7, exit:add r0,r0,r0, j exit]
